name: Loop Dun(geons) Dare v0.5
description:
Loop Dun(geons) Dare v0.5

This is for join the FFS on Jan 2021 & practice purpose  

Topic : 2D,  AI, Upgrade & Deploy & Mining System,UI & Canvas, Pixle Art.

Team Type : Solo 

Time Used on Previous  ver.  : 3 day 21+ hr  

Old ver.  : https://sunraymanz.itch.io/loop-dun-dare-v2

Time Used on This ver.  : 12+ day (estimate)    

------------------ About Game  ------------------

Fight The Endless Battle, kill enemy and get lv Up!(Damage,Cri chance,Cri damage) Also if you get kill.....  Don't worry! you will Reborn like the enemy!!

Now with Selectable Upgrade UI & Deploy & Mining System and much more!!

P.S. 

------------------ How To Play ------------------

WASD : Move
Space: Jump
Move Mouse : Aim
Left Click : shoot mini bullet
Right Click : shoot Laser bullet

Left SHIFT : Blink

Thank you for testing my prototype!

-SunraymanZ-
